name: Travellers Oasis
description:
Welcome to Travellers Oasis, Cairns


Travellers Oasis has won four HOSCARs awards:
-	Best Small Hostel in Oceania
-	2nd Best Hostel by Continent in Oceania
-	Best Solo Hostel in Oceania
-	Most Popular Hostel in Cairns

 Your Tropical Haven in Cairns!
At Travellers Oasis, we offer comfortable, safe, and spotlessly clean facilities tailored for budget-conscious travelers—all within a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Our goal is to create a true "Traveller's Paradise" where you can unwind and feel at home.

A Tropical Haven
Nestled in lush gardens, our beautifully restored property captures the charm of tropical North Queensland. Relax in a hammock beneath the palms, take a dip in our sparkling pool, or enjoy a laid-back BBQ in our outdoor dining area.

Accommodation Options
We provide a variety of accommodation styles to suit every traveler:

Dormitories (3, 4, or 6 beds)
Private rooms, including single, twin, and double options
Deluxe Double Rooms with a smart TV, private balcony, and hammock for ultimate relaxation
All rooms come with fresh linen, towels, ceiling fans, and air conditioning. Our double rooms feature queen-sized beds, bedside lamps, tables, and televisions, while private rooms also include a refrigerator stocked with complimentary bottled water.

Prime Location
Located just a short walk from Cairns city center, our hostel is close to shops, cinemas, banks, supermarkets, restaurants, and the waterfront. We’re also conveniently near dive schools, making us the perfect base for exploring the Great Barrier Reef.

Amenities & Features
Comfortable beds with fresh linens and towels included at no extra cost
Three fully equipped kitchens for all your cooking needs
Garden and pool area for relaxing or socializing
BBQ area with prep space and utensils
Laundry facilities (washer, dryer, and iron)
Complimentary tea, coffee, and fresh herbs
Free games, magazines, and a book exchange
Luggage storage and ample street parking
Internet access & WiFi throughout the property
Free Tour Booking Service
Our on-site information desk is here to make your stay seamless! We provide free tour booking services, detailed maps, and personalized itineraries to help you explore Cairns and its surroundings. Book any tour through us and enjoy free bike hire as an added bonus!

Whether you're seeking adventure or relaxation, our friendly and welcoming oasis provides the comforts of home in the heart of Cairns.

Have questions or special requests? Get in touch—we’re happy to help!

We can't wait to welcome you to Travellers Oasis!
hostelworldSays:
Home is where the heart is !!
Step into our slice of Paradise, where exceptional service flows like a gentle stream, nourishing every guest who graces our abode. Amidst the whirlwind of 2024, our dedication remains unwavering, honored with titles like "Best Small Hostel in Oceana" and "Most Popular Hostel in Cairns" at the Hoscars.

But our Oasis offers more than accolades. Sink into our haven of tranquility, where each bed is a cocoon of serenity, and every corner whispers of peace. Whether you seek solace in our snug double rooms with their bounty of pillows or sway gently in our hammocks amidst lush gardens, find your sanctuary within.

Embrace the serenity of our oasis - our inviting pool, bathed in sunlight, beckons you to immerse yourself fully. And behold, our Bali-style outdoor shower, a testament to nature's harmony.

Nourish your spirit with culinary delights from Calavera's Street Food, mere steps from our sanctuary. And for those called by the ocean's depths, Pro Dive and Divers Den await, just a tranquil 5-minute stroll away.

Regardless of age or spirit, our Oasis welcomes all, offering a haven for every traveler's soul. Your journey finds meaning here, as we pledge an indelible imprint on the tapestry of your memories.

houseRules.notes:
Travellers Oasis Hostel – Booking & Cancellation Policy

Cancellation Policy:

Cancellations made 72 hours (3 days) or more before the check-in date: No charges will apply.​

Cancellations made within 72 hours (3 days) of the check-in date: Full payment will be charged, and no refunds will be issued.​

Please note that we process payments 72 hours prior to your arrival.​

Payment Details:

A 1.1 % surcharge applies to all card payments.​

Check-In & Check-Out:

Check-in is available from 11:00 AM on the day of your booking.​

Please note that we do not process check-ins or check-outs on Christmas Day or New Year's Day.​

Room Allocation:

When booking multiple dorm beds, we cannot guarantee that your group will be accommodated in the same room.​

To ensure your group stays together, please consider booking private room(s).​

Guest Age & Room Requirements:

All guests under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult and are required to book a private room.​

We recommend that mature guests book private rooms for their comfort and the comfort of others.​

Identification & Payment:

A valid photo ID (passport or driver's license) is required at check-in.​

A valid credit card in the guest's name is required for check-in.​

House Rules:

Quiet hours are from 10:00 PM; no noise or alcohol is permitted after this time.​

We do not accept bookings for stag, hen, or birthday parties.​

Group bookings of 6 or more guests require prior approval from management.​

The maximum stay is limited to 7 nights.​

Pricing:

All prices are quoted in Australian dollars (AUD) and are inclusive of taxes, on a per-night basis.​

Additional Information:

No refunds will be issued for cancellations due to flight, bus, train  or weather disruptions. Guests are advised to seek compensation through their travel insurance or directly with the transport provider.​

Management reserves the right to refuse or cancel a booking at their discretion.
